<title level="1" right="Action">[Mighty Rage](/Actions.aspx?ID=4) <actions string="Free Action" /></title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=18" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 85 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Trigger** You use the Rage action on your turn.

</column>

---

Use an action that has the [rage](/Traits.aspx?ID=135) trait. Alternatively, you can increase the actions of the triggering Rage to 2 to instead use a 2-action activity with the rage trait.
name: Mighty Rage
